snippet: Andy Murray has what it takes to ruin Novak Djokovic's dreams of sweeping to a 'golden slam', coach Ivan Lendl has said as the Scot prepares for another tilt at the Wimbledon title....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray has what it takes to ruin Novak Djokovic's dreams of sweeping to a 'golden slam', coach Ivan Lendl has said as the Scot prepares for another tilt at the Wimbledon title.

headline.print_headline: Lendl Says Murray Can End Djokovic's 'Golden Slam' Dream
headline.main: Lendl Says Murray Can End Djokovic's 'Golden Slam' Dream
